about_the_game:
Enjoy The Symbiant in its full pant-tightening and underwear-wetting glory with the FREE adult patch!

Bear witness to Brahve's and Danya's romance blooming in its horny frenzy, and find out exactly what the Symbiant looks like and what he does with his juicy tentacles deep in space. Fully voiced!

The Symbiant - 18+ Adult Only Patch contains explicit uncensored sex scenes (gay) and tentacle sex (consensual), and it also adds nudity and sexual themed dialogue to several scenes.

Gay sex acts, including:

1. Groping
2. Hand job
3. Oral sex, rimming
4. Masturbation
5. Fingering
6. Using a dildo
6. Anal Sex
7. Rape roleplay (consensual)
8. Tentacle sex (consensual)
9. Double penetration

Some kinks are part of the content including teasing, spanking, and male domination.

This DLC is only for those who are of legal age and wish to see such content. By downloading this DLC you are confirming you are 18 years of age or older (or your regional equivalent) and agree to see undressing, nudity and sexual interactions.

Installation instructions


1. Click on Download.
2. Wait till DLC finishes downloading.
3. If the game auto launches - CLOSE IT.
4. Restart Steam.
5. Start The Symbiant from your Library.

content_descriptors.notes: The Symbiant - 18+ Adult Only Patch contains explicit uncensored erotic scenes (gay) and sex with an tentacle-alien creature (consensual).

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo, AMD Phenom II or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT 750
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6+
  • Processor: 1GHz
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
